title: Emmerdale spoilers: Cain discovers truth about son Nate and mum Cara
text:
Cain Dingle (Jeff Hordley) has already been betrayed by wife Moira (Natalie J Robb) in Emmerdale, leaving him shattered and with his marriage in ruins – but now he may also be unable to forgive his mum Faith (Sally Dexter) as she has been lying to him for a lot longer, knowing that he has a son he isn’t aware of.

Nate Robinson (Jurell Carter) tonight confronted Cain about sleeping with Cara and then ignoring the fact that he had a son. But, while Cain admitted to knowing Cara and having a relationship with her after meeting in the pub, he assured Nate that this was the first he ever knew that she was pregnant.

Nate branded him a liar, telling him that Cara had sent letters and made several attempts to contact him but it became clear that Cain had no idea what Nate was talking about. Faith, however, did – and turned up at the hospital to tell the full truth at last.

Cain was flabbergasted as she explained that she knew that Cara had had his son – but because of Shadrach’s violence and bigotry, she tried to protect Cain by keeping it a secret from him as she feared that Shadrach would hurt him, Nate and Cara.

Cain was disgusted with Faith for keeping this secret from him for so long and it seems inevitable that this is what will trigger her exit from the show as Cain turns his back on her for this deception.

But while biologically, Cain now knows that Nate is his offspring, he is no closer to welcoming him as his son given that Nate has come with the specific intention of destroying Cain’s life by splitting him from Moira and even trying to get Kyle taken from him.

With Cain now seething and hurt by both Moira and Faith – the two women he should have trusted most – what will he do now?

And where does this leave Nate as he has sought revenge on the wrong person?
